segments.text: It's very nice , I like it very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I invite you for the first dance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My pleasure . But I'm afraid I'm not much of a dancer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In fact , I took up dancing quite recently , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , really ? But you're doing the tango wonderfully well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad you say so , you dance beautifully too . It's lucky that I got a partner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your compliments . It's just that you are a good leader . Do you like the samba and waltz ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . And what dances do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Waltz is my favorite . I like it better than any other dances .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , the music has stopped . Thank you for the dance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My pleasure . Let's go and have a drink .
segments.speaker: S2
